name: Green Haven FCT Abuja
detail: 456 Garden Way, Garki, Abuja, This charming family home in the heart of Garki offers 4 bedrooms, a lush garden, and a serene atmosphere. Perfect for those seeking a peaceful urban retreat.

name: Luxury Villa in Maitama
detail: 789 Presidential Drive, Maitama, Abuja. Live in opulence in this lavish villa in Maitama. With 6 spacious bedrooms, a swimming pool, and a grand foyer, it's a true symbol of luxury in Abuja.

name: Abuja Executive Apartment
detail: 123 Business District Avenue, Wuse, Abuja. This stylish apartment in Wuse boasts 2 bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and easy access to the city's business district. Ideal for professionals and executives.

name: Tranquil Duplex in Gwarinpa
detail: 101 Peaceful Street, Gwarinpa, Abuja.  Enjoy the peaceful surroundings of Gwarinpa with this spacious 5-bedroom duplex. It features a beautiful garden and ample space for a growing family.

name: Abuja Heights Penthouse
detail: 567 Skyline Avenue. Experience luxury living at its finest in this breathtaking penthouse in Jabi. With 3 spacious bedrooms, panoramic city views, and top-of-the-line amenities, it's a true symbol of prestige.

name: Serene Duplex in Life Camp
detail: Find peace and comfort in this elegant duplex in Life Camp. Featuring 4 bedrooms, a landscaped garden, and a modern kitchen, it's perfect for a growing family.
